### **Fase 3: CI Integration**
```yaml
# .github/workflows/binary-tests.yml (para task-036 GitHub Actions)
name: Binary Tests
on:
  push:
    branches: [main, release/*]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test-binaries:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest, macos-latest]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
      - name: Build frontend
        run: npm run build:frontend
      - name: Build binaries
        run: npm run build:binaries
      - name: Test binaries
        run: npm run test:binaries
      - name: Upload test results
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: test-results-${{ matrix.os }}
          path: test-results/
```
